const BB: u8 = b'b';
const TT: u8 = b't';
const NN: u8 = b'n';
const FF: u8 = b'f';
const RR: u8 = b'r';
const QU: u8 = b'"';
const BS: u8 = b'\\';
const UU: u8 = b'u';
const __: u8 = 0;
#[cfg_attr(docsrs, doc(cfg(feature = "std")))]
pub struct Serializer<W, F = CompactFormatter> {
    writer: W,
    formatter: F,
}
#[derive(Clone, Debug)]
pub struct PrettyFormatter<'a> {
    current_indent: usize,
    has_value: bool,
    indent: &'a [u8],
}
impl<'a, W> Serializer<W, PrettyFormatter<'a>>
where
    W: io::Write,
{
    #[inline]
    pub fn pretty(writer: W) -> Self {
        Serializer::with_formatter(writer, PrettyFormatter::new())
    }
}
impl<'a> PrettyFormatter<'a> {
    pub fn new() -> Self {
        PrettyFormatter::with_indent(b"  ")
    }
    pub fn with_indent(indent: &'a [u8]) -> Self {
        PrettyFormatter {
            current_indent: 0,
            has_value: false,
            indent,
        }
    }
}

The function to be tested is presented with each line formatted as 'line number + code':
